page.title: 05TEMPLETONS SUPERMARKET NAIRN
page.content: At a cost of{one and a half million {pounds}on the{4th December 1984} Templetons opened a supermarket on {King Street}with a thirteen thousand square foot floor area.The store employs seventy one people who work in the meat,baking and fish departments as well as being employed as shelf fillers ,office workers,checkouts and stock supervisors.{Friday}is the supermarkets busiest day in the week.They offer late night shopping until{8pm}on a{Thursday}and{7pm}on a{ {Friday.}A further facility for the shopper is 86 free car parking spaces which were created in the centre of the town by demolishing an area of building behind the{High Street.}
